00058 /*
00059  * Convert to the CHP pointer.
00060  */
00061 FusionCHPLegacyData * FusionCHPLegacyData::FromBase(FusionCHPData *chip)
00062 {
00063         if (chip != NULL && chip->GetObjectName() == ObjectName)
00064                 return (FusionCHPLegacyData *)chip;
00065         return NULL;
00066 }

00208 void FusionCHPHeader::CheckAdapter() const
00209 {
00210         if (adapter == 0)
00211         {
00212                 FileNotOpenException e;
00213                 throw e;
00214         }
00215 }

00308 void FusionCHPLegacyData::CreateAdapter()
00309 {
00310         if (adapter)
00311                 return;
00312 
00313         // Create a Calvin adapter
00314         IFusionCHPDataAdapter* calvinAdapter = new CalvinCHPDataAdapter();
00315         if (calvinAdapter)
00316         {
00317                 calvinAdapter->SetFileName(filename);
00318                 if (calvinAdapter->CanReadFile())
00319                 {
00320                         adapter = calvinAdapter;
00321                         header.Clear();
00322                         header.adapter = calvinAdapter;
00323                 }
00324                 else
00325                 {
00326                         delete calvinAdapter;
00327                         IFusionCHPDataAdapter* gcosAdapter = new GCOSCHPDataAdapter();
00328                         if (gcosAdapter)
00329                         {
00330                                 gcosAdapter->SetFileName(filename);
00331                                 if (gcosAdapter->CanReadFile())
00332                                 {
00333                                         adapter = gcosAdapter;
00334                                         header.Clear();
00335                                         header.adapter = gcosAdapter;
00336                                 }
00337                                 else
00338                                 {
00339                     adapter = 0;
00340                                         UnableToOpenFileException e;
00341                     if(gcosAdapter!= NULL)
00342                         delete gcosAdapter;
00343                     gcosAdapter = 0;
00344                                         throw e;
00345                                 }
00346                         }
00347                         else
00348                         {
00349                 adapter = 0;
00350                                 UnableToOpenFileException e;
00351                 if(gcosAdapter!= NULL)
00352                     delete gcosAdapter;
00353                 gcosAdapter = 0;
00354                                 throw e;
00355                         }
00356                 }
00357         }
00358 }
00359 
00360 void FusionCHPLegacyData::DeleteAdapter()
00361 {
00362         if (adapter)
00363                 delete adapter;
00364         adapter = 0;
00365         header.adapter = 0;
00366 }
